    Identified interventions under a linear mediated RDPG

Function reference

Estimation

netmediate()
Estimate network direct and indirect effects via a spectral method
sensitivity_curve()
Estimate mediated effects for a variety of embedding dimensions
nodelm()
Use spectral node embeddings in ordinary least squares regression
U() US() V() VS()
Helper functions for including node embeddings in formulas
Z() Y()
Helper functions for including rotated node embeddings in formulas
